item.description:
Good afternoon Coffee Talkers,

A co - worker of mine said that her cousin published
A Poetry Book.

Her cousin is bringing her to Richters Cafe in New Haven

http://www.yelp.com/b...

www.yelp.com/biz/richters-new-haven

For my co-worker to help her read sections of the

Poetry Book.

I have to go to cheer on, and tease, my co-worker

As she is reading sections her cousins poetry.

Does anyone else want to come to Richters tonight
For a couple of drinks?

I have training on Thursday morning, so I will have
To leave after a couple of drinks to get up for
Training tomorrow.

http://www.takeoutton...


www.takeouttonight.com/menus/connecticut/new%20haven/06510/Richters_2037770400/Lunch-Dinner/

Mike B
item.how_to_find_us: Richters Cafe is a small bar so it should not be too hard to bump into me.
item.why: Something to do on a Wednesday night. Not for those who cannot be around Alcohol.
item.name: Book Readings & Richters Cafe on April 2
